div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 173 Dokimion (Malamata-Kyparissia), Acarnania, 1955 Burial: c. 250-225 B.C. (Varoucha) Contents: 50 AR. Pot hoard Alexander III: 1 tetradr. (Sicyon) 1 dr. (Sardes) Lysimachus: 1 dr. (Lampsacus) Aetolia: 1 triob. Locri Opuntii: 1 triob. Boeotia: 1 dr. Chalcis: 9 dr. Aegina: 3 st.; 1 dr.; 1 triob. Sicyon: 1 st.; 1 dr.; 24 triob. Hermione: 1 triob. Arcadian League: 2 triob. Ptolemy II: 1 tetradr. Disposition: Athens Varoucha, BCH 1956, p. 227, illus. Warren, ANSMN 15 (1969), p. 33, illus. (the Arcadian coins)
